description: This is a Java source file defining a Spring Boot REST controller advice class for handling global exceptions and standardizing error responses in a notes management backend.

classes.name: GlobalExceptionHandler
classes.description: A class annotated with @RestControllerAdvice to handle exceptions globally in a Spring Boot application, returning standardized error responses.

methods.name: handleNotFound
methods.description: Handles NotFoundException, returning a 404 error response.

methods.name: handleBadRequest
methods.description: Handles multiple exceptions indicating bad request errors, returning a 400 error response.

methods.name: handleGeneric
methods.description: Handles all other exceptions, returning a 500 internal server error response.

methods.name: buildError
methods.description: Constructs the error response payload with message, error type, HTTP status code, request path, and timestamp.
